name: enableLoopbackRecording
description:
Enables loopback audio capturing.
If you enable loopback audio capturing, the output of the sound card is mixed into the audio stream sent to the other end.
       
  
      This method applies to macOS and Windows only.
      You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

parameters.enabled:
Sets whether to enable loopback capturing.
 true: Enable loopback audio capturing.
 false: (Default) Disable loopback capturing.

parameters.deviceName: The device name of the sound card. The default value is null (the default sound card). If you use a virtual sound card like "Soundflower", set this parameter as the name of the sound card, "Soundflower". The SDK will find the corresponding sound card and start capturing.
